name: Zilla 2020 (Atari 2600 Prototype)
description:
Introducing the new LEGALLY DISTINCT 'Zilla 2020 for the Atari 2600 VCS
Free from the shackles of intellectual property, I offer you the chance to obtain your very own ROM of this prototype direct from the source, now 100% guilt free due to it's availability outside of unauthorized third party reproductions!

This game has you controlling 'Zilla, crushing all buildings in his path while avoiding the dreadful Butterdie. Destroy to your heart's content, but take care that you don't get crushed yourself!

This ROM image requires a 2600 emulator such as the freely available Stella or flash cart to play. This is a real Atari 2600 rom, NOT modern computer software.
